snippet.title: Amiga Longplay Colorado
snippet.description:
http://www.recordedamigagames.org

Played By: Laffer

Longplay of Colorado. This is a pretty good game.. good atmosphere even though there's hardly any music. Nice little pseudo 3D canoo part. The only real downside to this game is the stiff controls. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
